extension.name: Events Booking - Auto Subscribe Membership Plan
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin is used to subscribe registrants in Events Booking to Membership Pro subscription plan if the event they register for is associated with certain plan.

field.name: ignore_if_user_has_existing_subscription
field.label: Ignore If User Has Existing Subscription
field.description: If set to Yes, in case users already subscribed for the plan, they won't be auto subscribed for the plan again when register for the event
